name: RAKETENWASCHMACHINE
description:
Hey! Who forgot to turn off the washing machine? Now the world is constantly spinning, not stopping for a second.
RAKETENWASCHMACHINE is an action-puzzle game set in a constantly spinning world. Dozens of completely messed up levels will melt your brain or drive you crazy.
• Fast-paced action-puzzle gameplay.
• Beautiful pixel art.
• Stylish chiptune soundtrack.
• 20 hardcore levels.
Avoid the obstacles and get to the end of the level
